nodes.text: The Coruscant equatorial belt was an area of the planet of Coruscant in the Core Worlds region. In the year 20 BBY the area was considered prestigious by the Sakiyan Republic navy Admiral Tarnese Bleyd who planned to purchase an apartment at the top of a monad in the equatorial belt using money from working with the Black Sun criminal organization.
The Coruscant equatorial belt first appeared in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel in the MedStar Duology, written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry and published in 2004.
